typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SalesAddresses
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SalesCustomers
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StreamAddreses
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StreamCustomers
SalesAddresses, SalesCustomers join(SalesAddresses@CustomerID == SalesCustomers@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
StreamAddreses, StreamCustomers join(StreamAddreses@CustomerID == StreamCustomers@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join1 derive(SourceSystemId = 1,
		GlobalCustomerID = uuid(),
		SourceSystemCustomerID = SalesCustomers@CustomerID,
		CreatedDate = iif(SalesCustomers@CreatedDate > SalesAddresses@CreatedDate, SalesCustomers@CreatedDate,SalesAddresses@CreatedDate ),
		UpdatedDate = iif(SalesCustomers@UpdatedDate > SalesAddresses@UpdatedDate,SalesCustomers@UpdatedDate, SalesAddresses@UpdatedDate)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemId,
		GlobalCustomerID,
		SourceSystemCustomerID,
		AddressID,
		CustomerID = SalesAddresses@CustomerID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		CustomerID = SalesCustomers@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
